system.requirement: After you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.725a21e2f02d7e12]{Fulfill Your Vow} to be found worthy of Skofnung, quest to find it, and wield it, set your essence to +6 representing spiritual bodyguards in gems on the blade. When you draw your own blood and @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.fdb51ee928b4fca2]{Endure Harm} to honor those spirits, add +1 essence. When you use an ability below, roll +essence. On a strong hit, the ability occurs. On a weak hit, as above but @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.e09e2fc8bb709320]{Endure Stress} (1 stress). On a miss, suffer the -essence and Pay the Price.

abilities.description: Suffer -1 essence to gain the Kindred asset with Skilled and Shield-Kin upgrades until the next dawn.
Suffer -2 essence to gain the Cutthroat asset with all three upgrades unlocked until the next dawn.
Suffer -3 essence. Gain the benefit of a strong hit on the Leech ritual's first ability.
